name: Connected Poster: Limited Edition (73)
description: The limited edition poster has now sold out, but we're working on distributing a batch of unnumbered posters. Please use the contact form on this webshop if you wish to be informed when the new posters are available. Thanks. ——— Poster for the short film Connected — a sci-fi western Directed by Jens Raunkjær Christensen and Jonas Drotner Mouritsen. As a response to the overwhelming interest in the Connected Poster, we've chosen to make it available for purchase. It's currently available in a limited edition of 73 numbered prints. The poster is crafted in the southern Denmark, Kolding by the two designers Joaquim Marqués Nielsen and Anders Baden Nielsen from the Danish design studio Barq. It is offset printed on thick 200g recycled paper, which goes perfectly hand in hand with the retro vibe of the design. Set in the distant future, Connected is a story about survival and greed with a post apocalyptic wasteland as its backdrop. Survivors of an unknown disaster shuffle through a desolate landscape, as it quickly becomes clear that not everybody has the strength to survive. Details Format: 66 x 100 cm (26,0 x 39,3 inches) Paper: 100% recycled Cyclus Offset 200 g/m2 Read more about the movie at the official website www.ov43.com. Check out more of Barq's work in their portfolio at www.barq.dk. Get an in-depth into the proces of creating the poster at Joaquim's blog.

name: Connected Poster: Original Print-run
description: Good news for those of you who didn't manage to get one of the personally numbered and signed prints. Since we've been floored with requests from people all over the world, we've decided to give you guys who weren't lucky enough to get your hands on the numbered prints, a second chance. We are now selling the last posters from the first print run. Be sure to get yours while there's still a few left. Poster for the short film Connected — a sci-fi western Directed by Jens Raunkjær Christensen and Jonas Drotner Mouritsen.
